name: Omega Healthcare
description: Founded in 2003, Omega Healthcare empowers healthcare organizations to deliver exceptional care while enhancing financial performance. We help clients increase revenues, decrease costs, and improve the overall patient-provider-payer experience through our comprehensive portfolio of technology and clinically enabled solutions. Omega Healthcare has 30,000 employees across 14 delivery centers in the United States, India, Colombia, and the Philippines.
features: 1000+ Bots designed and delivered to leading healthcare companies.
8 Million Patient support calls and inbox emails handled per year.

enhanced_description: Founded in 2003, Omega Healthcare is a leading provider of technology-enabled Revenue Cycle Management (RCM), real-world data, pharma access, and payer risk solutions. Their comprehensive portfolio of technology and clinically enabled solutions empowers healthcare organizations to deliver exceptional care while enhancing financial performance. They help clients accelerate cash flow, increase revenues, decrease administrative costs, and improve the overall patient-provider-payer experience. With 30,000 employees across 14 delivery centers in the United States, India, Colombia, and the Philippines, Omega Healthcare leverages extensive automation, having designed and delivered over 1000 bots. Annually, they code more than 118 million medical charts and handle 8 million patient support calls and inbox emails. Their services are designed to enhance the patient experience, improve reimbursement, and increase efficiencies for providers; optimize financial results, improve member satisfaction, and ensure compliance for payers; and provide seamless market access services for pharma companies. Omega Healthcare also offers solutions in Learning and Development and Total Rewards, including Training eLearning software and Benefits administration software, aimed at accelerating skill development and learning efficiency for their clients.
competitive_advantages: Global delivery model with 30,000 employees across 14 centers
Extensive automation capabilities (1000+ bots designed and delivered)
High volume processing capacity (118+ Million Medical charts coded annually)
Proven experience in patient communication (8 Million Patient support calls and inbox emails handled per year)
Comprehensive portfolio of technology and clinically enabled solutions
Deep domain expertise in healthcare RCM, data, pharma access, and payer risk
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
primary_users: HR Professionals (for L&D and Benefits solutions)
compliance_features: Support for compliance with industry regulations (for payers)
scalability_features: Global delivery network (30,000 employees across 14 centers)
High volume processing capabilities (118+ Million charts, 8 Million calls)
